data.title: Villas for rent in Sant'antonio Di Gallura. Italy holiday rentals
data.meta_description: Villas for rent in Sant'antonio Di Gallura. These holiday rentals are located in Sardinia, Italy. Beautiful villas, apartments and farmhouses available | Villa Search Results 61 - 80 of 247
data.text:
Description

Property Summary

Trebbiano is a renovated 2-family house located in the hamlet of Portobello di Gallura, Aglientu, Italy. It offers a private property with a wildlife garden, outdoor shower, and barbecue facilities. The vacation rental also features parking on the premises, ensuring convenient access for your stay.

Outdoors

Embracing the beauty of nature, the property boasts a private wildlife garden where you can bask in the tranquil surroundings. An outdoor shower and barbecue area provide the perfect setting for alfresco dining and relaxation.

Other Information

Trebbiano is situated in a residential area with villas, offering a peaceful and traffic-calmed environment. While a car is recommended for your convenience, the property is within proximity to various amenities, including a supermarket, restaurant, bar, and sandy beach, all within 1.5 km. Additionally, a marina and tennis court are located 1.5 km and 2.5 km away, respectively.

Distances and Attractions

Nearby attractions include Santa Teresa di Gallura, located 25 km away, and the Acqufantasy water park, situated 26 km from the property. Explore the charming surroundings and discover the local attractions that make this holiday rental a delightful destination. Trebbiano

Description

Property Summary

The 2-family house "Tritone" is a vacation rental located in the hamlet of La Finosa, 4 km from the center of Porto San Paolo and 15 km from Olbia, Italy. It offers a quiet position in a traffic-calmed area, with direct access to the sandy beach "La Finosa" just 5 meters away. The property features a yard and parking on the premises, making it convenient for those traveling by car.

Outdoors

The property is situated just 5 meters from the sandy beach "La Finosa," providing easy access to the beautiful sea. Additionally, there is a yard on the premises, offering outdoor space for relaxation or recreational activities.

Other Information

Please note that a car is recommended for accessing the property, as it is located 1.5 km away via an unmade road. The owner resides in a separate semi-detached house on the same property. It's important to be aware of the potential presence of animals in the neighborhood. Another property, ref. IT7201.700.1, is situated on the same premises.

Distances and Attractions

The property is conveniently located within a short distance from various amenities and attractions. It is 4 km from the center of Porto San Paolo and 15 km from the center of Olbia, providing access to restaurants, bars, and shopping areas. The nearby sandy beach "La Finosa" is just 5 meters away, offering opportunities for beach activities and enjoying the beautiful Sardinian coastline. Tritone

Description

Property Summary:

The "Baia de Bahas" is a cozy and comfortable residence, constructed in 1980. It offers a shared garden with plants and flowers, as well as access to tennis courts (additional fee) and a children's playground within the complex. The complex also features a restaurant, bar, and shopping facilities. Parking is available on the premises, albeit with a limited number of spaces. This holiday rental is located 1.5 km from the center of Golfo di Marinella and 6 km from the center of Porto Rotondo, situated in a sunny position on a slope, just 300 m from the sea and the sandy "Baia de Bahas" beach.

Outdoors:

The residence boasts a shared garden with plants and flowers, providing a tranquil outdoor space for guests to enjoy. Additionally, the complex offers a tennis court, which is available for an extra fee, and a children's playground, ensuring entertainment for all ages.

Other Information:

Within the complex, you'll find a restaurant, bar, and shopping facilities, catering to your dining and shopping needs. Parking is available on the premises, although the number of spaces is limited. It's important to note that a car is recommended due to the residence's location, and there is no elevator (lift) in the building.

Distances and Attractions:

The "Baia de Bahas" residence is conveniently situated near various attractions. The sandy "Baia de Bahas" beach is just 300 m away, and a marina is located 500 m from the property. Tennis courts are within 200 m of the residence. Nearby attractions include Golfo Aranci (7 km), Olbia, Italy (14 km), San Pantaleo (17 km), and the renowned Porto Cervo (27 km). Golfo Di Marinella 300

Description

Property Summary

Nodu Pianu, a 2-family house called "Vista Figari", offers an idyllic vacation rental situated 3 km from Pittulongu. With a yard and tennis court on-site, this property provides ample outdoor space for recreation and relaxation.

Outdoors

Immerse yourself in the natural beauty of the surroundings, as the property boasts a shared garden area. Enjoy al fresco dining with the convenience of a barbecue, or engage in a friendly tennis match on the court.

Other Information

The property is conveniently located within proximity to essential amenities. A supermarket, restaurant, and bar are all within a 3 km radius, ensuring that your needs are well-catered for during your stay.

Distances and Attractions

Situated 12 km from the center of Olbia and 10 km from the center of Golfo Aranci, this holiday rental offers easy access to nearby attractions and points of interest. Additionally, a sandy beach is just 450 m away, providing the perfect opportunity to soak up the sun and enjoy the crystal-clear waters of the Mediterranean Sea. Vista Figari

Description

Property Summary

Immerse yourself in the tranquility of "La Cala (VGM615)," a charming vacation rental situated in the peaceful hamlet of Portobello di Gallura, Aglientu, Italy. This cozy house offers a convenient location, just 16 km from the center of Aglientu and 7 km from Vignola's center. Nestled on a slope in a quiet, sun-drenched residential area with villas and traffic-calmed streets, the property boasts a serene atmosphere. Enjoy the added convenience of being just 50 meters from motor access and a short stepped path leading to the house. With a yard and a tennis court nearby, you'll have ample opportunities for outdoor recreation.

Outdoors

Nestled in a picturesque residential area with villas and traffic-calmed streets, this property offers a serene outdoor experience. The house is situated on a slope, basking in the warmth of the sun. Just 400 meters away, you'll find a sandy beach, perfect for lazy days by the sea. For those seeking active pursuits, a tennis court is conveniently located within 700 meters.

Other Information

Aglientu and the surrounding area offer a wealth of amenities for your convenience. A supermarket, restaurant, and bar are all within a 1 km radius, ensuring easy access to essential services and dining options. Animal lovers can appreciate the presence of animals in the neighborhood, adding to the charm of the location.

Distances and Attractions

While enjoying the tranquility of "La Cala (VGM615)," you'll have easy access to nearby attractions. Santa Teresa di Gallura, a charming town, is just 25 km away, while the thrilling Acquafantasy water park is a 26 km drive, perfect for a day of family fun. With the recommendation of having a car, exploring the surrounding areas and discovering hidden gems becomes effortless. La Cala (vgm615)

Description

Property Summary

This cosy apartment block "Ippocampo" offers a charming vacation rental experience in Porto Rotondo, Italy. With its 2-storey structure and 10 apartments, it provides a tranquil and sunny setting in a residential area of villas. The property boasts a small garden area and is conveniently located just 1 km from the town center. Enjoy the convenience of having a grocery store, supermarket, and restaurant within 1 km, while the sandy beach is only 700 m away. The on-site parking and yard facilities make your stay even more comfortable.

Outdoors

Immerse yourself in the serene outdoor spaces of this property. Relax in the small private garden, soaking up the Italian sun and admiring the surrounding villas. Take a leisurely stroll to the nearby sandy beach, just 700 m away, and indulge in the coastal beauty of Porto Rotondo.

Other Information

This charming apartment block offers a truly convenient location. The town center of Porto Rotondo is just 1 km away, providing easy access to local amenities and attractions. Explore the marina, which is also within 1 km, and experience the vibrant coastal lifestyle. For those seeking adventure, the nearby towns of Olbia and Porto Cervo are worth visiting, located 18 km and 30 km away, respectively.

Distances and Attractions

While staying at this delightful property, you'll be within proximity to several notable attractions. The town center of Porto Rotondo, brimming with local charm, is just 1 km away. Take a leisurely stroll and explore the marina, which is also situated within 1 km. For those seeking a day trip, the lively town of Olbia is 18 km away, offering a wealth of cultural and historical experiences. If you're in the mood for a scenic drive, the picturesque Porto Cervo is only 30 km from the property, renowned for its stunning coastal landscapes. Ippocampo

Description

Property Summary

Villa Flamingo is a single-family house located in the hamlet of La Finosa, just 3.5 km from the center of Porto San Paolo and 15 km from Olbia, Italy. This vacation rental boasts a peaceful setting, situated a mere 40 meters from the sea. The property features a yard and parking on the premises, making it convenient for your stay.

Outdoors

Take advantage of the private outdoor shower, perfect for rinsing off after a day at the beach. While on the property, you may encounter animals in the neighborhood, adding to the rustic charm.

Other Information

For your convenience, the house is equipped with a washing machine. Please note that motor access to the property involves a 1.5 km drive on an unmade road, so a car is recommended. The owner resides on the same property, ensuring attentive service during your stay.

Distances and Attractions

Nearby amenities include a supermarket, restaurant, and bar located 3.5 km away. The sandy beach "La Finosa" is a short 40-meter stroll from the property, making it an ideal location for beach lovers. Other attractions in the area are also within a reasonable distance, providing ample opportunities for exploration and enjoyment. Flamingo

Description

Property Summary

Vista Golfo is an apartment house located 3 km from Pittulongu, offering 4 units within the property. It boasts a yard, a tennis court, and the convenience of an installment plan. You will appreciate its proximity to amenities, with a supermarket, restaurant, and bar just 3 km away, and a sandy beach only 400 meters from your doorstep.

Outdoors

Immerse yourself in the great outdoors at Vista Golfo, where you can enjoy a shared garden perfect for relaxation or alfresco dining. Embrace the Mediterranean lifestyle with a barbecue area on the premises. Ample public parking is available along the road.

Other Information

Please note that having a car is recommended during your stay at Vista Golfo, ensuring convenient exploration of the surrounding areas.

Distances and Attractions

Situated 10 km from the heart of Olbia and the lively Golfo Aranci, Vista Golfo offers easy access to nearby attractions and amenities in this picturesque region of Olbia, Italy. Whether you seek cultural experiences, vibrant nightlife, or simply wish to bask in the warmth of the Mediterranean, a holiday rental at Vista Golfo provides the perfect base for your adventures. Pittulongu 735

Description

Property Summary

Vista Tavolara is a simple apartment house located in Nodu Pianu, just 3 km from the beautiful beach town of Pittulongu. It offers a comfortable vacation rental with a yard and installment plan options for your convenience.

Outdoors

The property boasts a shared garden area where you can relax and enjoy the refreshing sea breeze. It is situated just 100 meters away from the sandy beach, making it an ideal choice for those seeking a beach holiday.

Other Information

Vista Tavolara is located 10 km from the center of Olbia and Golfo Aranci, two charming towns worth exploring. Nearby amenities include a supermarket, restaurant, and bar, all within a 3 km radius. Please note that having a car is recommended for your stay here.

Distances and Attractions

Situated in Nodu Pianu, Vista Tavolara is conveniently located near several attractions. It is just 3 km from the picturesque town of Pittulongu and its stunning sandy beaches. Additionally, the property is within a reasonable distance of Olbia (10 km) and Golfo Aranci (10 km), offering ample opportunities for sightseeing and exploring the local culture. With its proximity to the sea and nearby amenities, this holiday rental provides a perfect base for a relaxing and enjoyable stay in Olbia, Italy. Pittulongu 720

Description

Here is the outline with formatted sections based on the provided text:

Property Summary

Vista Playa is an apartment house comprising 4 apartments located in Nodu Pianu, just 3 km from Pittulongu and 10 km from the centers of Olbia and Golfo Aranci. It offers a yard, tennis court, and an installment plan option, making it an ideal holiday rental for those seeking a comfortable stay with recreational facilities.

Outdoors

The property boasts a shared garden area where you can relax and enjoy the beautiful surroundings. Additionally, a tennis court and barbecue facilities are available for your enjoyment.

Other Information

Motor access to the house is provided, and public parking is available on the road. Convenient amenities such as a supermarket, restaurant, and bar are located within 3 km of the property. Please note that a car is recommended for easy accessibility.

Distances and Attractions

Vista Playa is conveniently situated just 100 meters from the sandy beach, making it an excellent choice for those seeking a seaside vacation rental. Nearby attractions include the town centers of Olbia and Golfo Aranci, both located approximately 10 km away, offering a range of dining, shopping, and entertainment options. Pittulongu 710

Description

Property Summary

Vista Mare is a charming apartment house offering a vacation rental experience in Olbia, Italy. Nestled just 3 km from the picturesque town of Pittulongu, it boasts a prime location within 150 m of the sandy beach. The property comprises four apartments, providing ample space and privacy. Guests can enjoy shared access to a well-maintained garden, a tennis court, and a barbecue area, perfect for outdoor recreation and relaxation. With its proximity to amenities and natural beauty, Vista Mare offers an idyllic setting for your holiday rental.

Outdoors

Vista Mare's outdoor spaces are a true highlight, offering guests a chance to immerse themselves in the Mediterranean ambiance. The property boasts a shared garden, meticulously landscaped and designed for your enjoyment. Soak up the warm Italian sun while lounging on the lush green lawns or find a shady spot under the swaying trees. The on-site tennis court provides an excellent opportunity for active guests to indulge in a game or two. Additionally, a barbecue area is available, inviting you to savor delectable grilled dishes al fresco while appreciating the fresh sea breeze.

Other Information

Vista Mare is conveniently located in a prime area, with easy access to various amenities. A supermarket is situated just 3 km away, ensuring you can stock up on essential supplies during your stay. Nearby restaurants, cafés, and bars are also within a short distance, allowing you to indulge in the local culinary delights. For those seeking a car-free vacation, it is important to note that a car is recommended to fully explore the surrounding areas and reach nearby attractions with ease.

Distances and Attractions

Vista Mare is ideally situated near several attractions and points of interest. The property is just 10 km away from the center of Olbia, a charming coastal city known for its rich history, vibrant culture, and picturesque harbor. Additionally, the nearby town of Golfo Aranci, located 10 km away, offers a wealth of dining, shopping, and entertainment options. Nature enthusiasts will appreciate the property's proximity to the sea, with a stunning sandy beach merely 150 m away, perfect for swimming, sunbathing, and enjoying various water activities. Pittulongu 730

Description

Porto Rotondo Apartment With Pool is located 1 km (4224 ft) from Porto Rotondo, Italy and only 15 km (10 mi) from Olbia in the tourist area "Sardinia North Coast". Porto Rotondo Apartment With Pool is a beautiful vacation rental (45 sq m). The property can accommodate up to four people comfortably. The Italian coast offers you and your guests a unique experience with many activities such as boating, scuba diving, beaches and beautiful sunsets and it's all nearby (700 m 2270 ft).

The Experience

After arriving you’ll find a nice clean well-maintained property ideal for a peaceful holiday in Sardinia. Regardless of how you spend your days - visiting museums, shopping, sightseeing or just driving in the countryside, when you arrive home you can relax with your family and friends at the pool for a perfect ending to another day in Sardinia. If you enjoy cooking for family and friends there is a well-equipped kitchen including stove and refrigerator, as well as, plenty of tableware and cutlery for up to four people.

Places Nearby

Most people enjoy visiting nearby cities and towns while on vacation, so for your reference this is a list of popular places with distances (as the crow flies) from the property: Olbia 15 km (10 mi), Porto Cervo 28 km (18 mi), Castelsardo 104 km (65 mi), Sassari 118 km (73 mi) and Porto Torres 139 km (86 mi).

Some other major tourist destinations you should consider visiting are: Florence 413 km (257 mi), Rome 334 km (207 mi), Milan 626 km (389 mi) and Naples 545 km (338 mi).

Additional Information

Check-In Time: 16:00 - 19:00

Check-Out Time: 08:00 - 10:00

Pool Open: 17 May - 28 September (If you'd like the pool open outside these dates, please make that request prior to booking)

Nearest Airports (distances as the crow flies): Olbia (Olb) 21 km (13 mi), Cagliari (Cag) 276 km (172 mi), Roma Fiumicino (Fco) 320 km (199 mi), Roma Ciampino (Cia) 339 km (210 mi) and Pisa (Psa) 343 km (213 mi).

Porto Rotondo Apartment With Pool
